comments:
Build ID: I20070621-1340

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Build an RCP applications based on plug-ins.
2. refactor to RCP application based on features.
3. start the RCP application of 2), there will be error :No application id has been found. RCP in 1) will work fine.

Comparing the dependency in 1) and dependency in the RCP feature of 2), some plug-in are missed in RCP feature of 2). The RCP feature I used in 2) is: 3.3.0.v20070607-8y8eE8NEbsN3X_fjWS8HPNG.


More information:
Following is part of error message interesting:
